name: Connect Ultimate - roll balls
description:
- 20000 Levels. Yes! Ultimate for a reason!
- All free to play without purchase!
- Multiple Gaming methods: (Classic, Spinners & Blocks!)
- From Simple To Hard! (up to 7x7 Grids)!

Connect the Path by moving blocks around, until the path is completed from head to end! Sounds simple? Give it a try and you will see how addictive this puzzle game can be!

- Fully Optimized for latest iPhones & iPads!
- Give it a try, you will definitely love it!
